pages.text: You can use $(thing)Neptunian Steel$() to craft equipment designed specifically for aquatic environments.
$(thing)Neptunian Steel Ingot$() is created by welding $(thing)Neptunium ingot$() and $(thing)Black Steel ingot$() together, making it a highly advanced metal material.
Every tool or piece of equipment made from $(thing)Neptunian Steel$() lists its effects in the item tooltip, allowing you to check their functions directly from the item description.

Aside from equipment, both $(thing)Neptunium$() and $(thing)Neptunian Steel$() can also be processed into blocks, stairs, and slabs, making it easy to maintain a consistent style in water-themed constructions.
